bibl.title: [Michigan Papyri. Volume XVIII.] P. Michigan Koenen. Michigan Texts Published in Honor of Ludwig Koenen. (P. Mich. XVIII.)

series.title: Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia.

bibl.note: P. Mich. XVIII, 759-798. - Pp. xi-xiii: Cornelia Eva RÖMER, Ludwig Koenen in Köln. - Pp. xv-xix: Ann Ellis HANSON, Traianos GAGOS, Cornelia Eva RÖMER and Pieter Johannes SIJPESTEIJN, Ludwig Koenen in Ann Arbor. - Pp. xxi-xxix: Bibliography of Ludwig Koenen. - I. Greek Literary and Subliterary Papyri (759-768). - II. Greek Documentary Papyri (769-795). - III. Coptic Literary Papyri (796-798). - IV. Indices.
bibl.seg: RÖMER Cornelia E. and Traianos GAGOS (Edd.), Ann E. HANSON and Pieter J. SIJPESTEIJN † (Consulting Editors), [Michigan Papyri. Volume XVIII.] P. Michigan Koenen. Michigan Texts Published in Honor of Ludwig Koenen. (P. Mich. XVIII.) (Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia. XXXVI.)
Amsterdam, J.C. Gieben, 1996, 4°, xxxiv-416 pp., 1 portrait et 45 pll. ISBN 90-5063-127-4.

P. Mich. XVIII, 759-798. - Pp. xi-xiii: Cornelia Eva RÖMER, Ludwig Koenen in Köln. - Pp. xv-xix: Ann Ellis HANSON, Traianos GAGOS, Cornelia Eva RÖMER and Pieter Johannes SIJPESTEIJN, Ludwig Koenen in Ann Arbor. - Pp. xxi-xxix: Bibliography of Ludwig Koenen. - I. Greek Literary and Subliterary Papyri (759-768). - II. Greek Documentary Papyri (769-795). - III. Coptic Literary Papyri (796-798). - IV. Indices.
C.R. par Nikolaos Gonis, CR N.S., 49 (1999) pp. 236-237. - René Nünlist, MusHelv 55 (1998) p. 267. - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 67 (1998) pp. 436-437. - Reinhold Scholl, Gnomon 72 (2000) pp. 686-690.
